text.div:
CMS-Place-Of-Service

Place of Service codes are placed on health care professional claims to indicate the setting in which a service was provided

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://www.cms.gov/place-of-service

name: CMSPlaceOfService
title: CMS-Place-Of-Service
description: Place of Service codes are placed on health care professional claims to indicate the setting in which a service was provided
